description: Get healthy with this delicious vegetable detox soup. It is filled with the best detoxifying foods like ginger, turmeric, and spinach for a hearty vegan and gluten-free winter meal.
name: Detox Vegetable Soup
recipeIngredient: 1 small head of cauliflower, (broken into small bite-sized florets (roughly 4 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large soup pot, heat olive oil (or water) over medium heat. Add onions, garlic, and ginger and sauté for about 5 minutes, stirring often, until onions are fragrant and translucent. Add the celery, carrots, and cauliflower and sauté for another 5 minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.
Add the spices, stirring to fully coat.
Add the vegetable broth, tomatoes, chickpeas. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, cover, and let cook for about 20 minutes, until the cauliflower is cooked all the way through.
Remove from the heat and stir in the spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Taste and adjust seasonings. Let soup cool 10 minutes before serving.
